Quick Bytes
Gain valuable professional development skills that you can apply right away! Quick Bytes sessions cover a variety of topics and are relevant to graduate students at any stage in any degree program.
Sign up for an upcoming session

Recent News










 
Beyond the room where it happened
 Stanford Law School authors argue for a new vision of Native Peoples’ contributions to constitutional law.


April 18, 2023



FellowStudentsResearch






 
The 2020 election saw fewer people clicking on misinformation websites, Stanford study finds
 Stanford scholars find a smaller percentage of Americans visited unreliable websites in the run-up to the 2020 U.S. election than in 2016 – which suggests mitigation and...


April 13, 2023



FellowResearchStudents






 
Counting Cars: New AI-Driven Approach Fine-Tunes Road Tolls to Reduce Traffic
 Congestion pricing schemes to lessen traffic's societal costs could benefit from a simple, practical algorithm that optimizes tolls based on driver behavior.


April 10, 2023



FellowStudentsResearch










 

 

Every month VPGE puts a spotlight on one graduate student to highlight the many achievements and experiences of the Stanford graduate population. This month we are featuring Betty Xiong, a PhD student in Biomedical Informatics. Betty is also a 2023 Quad Fellow.
Follow us on YouTube for future Spotlights
